create.check: SELECT id FROM posts WHERE id=? LIMIT 1
create.insert: INSERT INTO comments (postId, userId, content) VALUE (?, ?, ?); SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS 'commentId'

getAll: SELECT c.id, c.postId, c.userId, COALESCE(u.firstName,'') AS 'firstName', COALESCE(u.lastName,'') AS 'lastName', u.imageUrl AS 'userImage',c.content, c.commentDate FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.userId = u.id WHERE c.postId=? ORDER BY c.commentDate ASC
update: UPDATE comments SET content = ? WHERE id = ? && userId = ? && postId = ?
